text: The 2018 China Formula 4 Championship (Shell Cup FIA F4 Chinese Championship) was the fourth season of the China Formula 4 Championship. It began on 13 May at the Ningbo International Circuit and finished on 14 October at the same place after six double header rounds, all of them co-hosted with the China Formula Grand Prix championship. ==Teams and drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- !
